metadata.title: CVE-2024-30949 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue in newlib v.4.3.0 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code viathe time unit scaling in the _gettimeofday function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-30949` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnewlib-arm-none-eabi - 4.4.0.20231231-2
newlib-source - 4.4.0.20231231-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: newlib package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0.20231231-2').
